titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Referral to Treatment Period Included in Referral to Treatment Consultant-led Waiting Times Measurement - Also Known As

body.p: This NHS business definition is also known by these names:

strow.stentry: Referral To Treatment Period Included In 18 Weeks Target
Referral To Treatment Periods Included In Referral To Treatment Consultant-Led Waiting Times Measurement
